RDNTLG.​Command.​ConsoleCommandAT
public static
RDNTLG.​Command.​ConsoleCommandAT

ConsoleCommandAT (Console Command Authoring Tools) provide methods to perform authoring operations inside the editor related to the RDNTLG.Command namespace.

Functions
CheckSignatures
[MenuItem("Tools/RDNTLG/Console Command/Check signatures...")]
public static void CheckSignatures()

Check the signature of each method in the assembly using the ConsoleCommandAttribute.

The expected signature is defined in ConsoleCommandSystem.CommandMethod.

DumpForMarkdown
[MenuItem("Tools/RDNTLG/Console Command/Dump commands to markdown...")]
public static void DumpForMarkdown()

Dump all ConsoleCommandAttribute into "{PROJ_ROOT}/ConsoleCommandsDump.md"
